CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked; M may be grandmother
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

u.a: <bef C holds up a cup>; <aft> M takes cup from C and puts it on saucer
M manipulates dishes; pours from teapot
<bef> M manipulates dishes with a lot of noise
M pushes some pots near C
C spoons from pot to in front of herself
M takes lid off a pot; C spoons from second pot to her cup and her plate
<bef> M pushes a pot to C; <aft> C spoons from it
<bef> M manipulates dishes; C concentrates on plate
M pours in her cup and then in C's
M spoons from a container to her cup and stirs
<bef> C takes her spoon out of her mouth; C reaches for container designated as sweetener
C pours from container to cup without using spoon; M laughs
C licks her spoon; reaches for something
M stops C with her hand
M gets teapot and pours in C's cup
C eats with her spoon; M manipulates dishes
<bef> C reaches with spoon near house
C picks up cup and lets toy drink
M holds up Care_Bear feelings book
M points at top of page
M closes Care_Bear book and opens second book
C is touching nursery rhyme book

not clear what C is right about
